resources.string: This app is primarily for selecting Merry-go round number. Basically this is how it works:

A user clicks the floating button with the wheel icon, which opens a screen where a user can generate a random number between 1-100 by spinning the wheel. The generated number (Spin Score) will be used to compute the merry go round number.
The merry go round number is computed by comparing all the spin scores of the chama members and as such the merry number will be displayed after all members have generated a SPIN SCORE
It is important that members spin the wheel ONLY ONCE, or in accordance to the number of Merry Go Round Enrollments
